name: Bridge Engineer
description:
Tackle Bridge Engineering problems like never before!

You are an Engineer tasked with building Bridges for different types of vehicles from an SUV to a large Truck!

You are faced with several different scenarios and environments that you would need to solve with 1 common goal among them all... to get the car across the other side!


13 Different drivable vehicles!
Drive the vehicles yourself behind the wheel in the driver seat or in 3rd Person View!



Tackle 21 levels with 3 level difficulties and 4 special levels.




Take advantage of 30+ items in your tool to make your idea into a Virtual Reality solution and build your ideal Bridge!

Take some time to relax in your own office space!


Are you ready to earn your "BRIDGINEER" Title?
